title: Something that bothers me about placements.
body:
Everyone gets dropped down their rank.
People say you can climb up back to your original rank fast if you belong there.

Yet the path to that rank is also filled with the same people trying to climb back where they originally were.
Wouldn't that mean you are facing the same people as you were back in ranked before the reset just at a lower elo?

It just seems weird.
Maybe several months later you can quickly climb back up pretty easily to back you were.
